ingredients: one 16 oz can of black beans
one 16 oz can of kidney beans
one 8 oz can of tomato sauce
10 oz frozen corn (or two small cans of corn, we used the summer crisp corn)
two 14.5 oz cans of diced tomatoes
one small can of diced green chillies
1 TBS chili powder, or more to taste
1-1/2 to 2 lbs of chicken (use skinless & boneless cuts, we used thighs)
